def main():
 res = 0
 ind = 0
 curr = []
 letterflag = False

 chars = list(input())

 for c in chars:
  if c.isalpha():
   if letterflag:
    val = int(''.join(curr))
    res = max(res, val)
    curr = curr[ind:]
   else:
    letterflag = True

   curr.append("9")
   ind = len(curr)

  else:
   curr.append(c)

 # Last call
 val = int(''.join(curr))
 res = max(res, val)
 print(res)

main()
